titles.title: A bill to extend patent numbered 3,387,268, quotation monitoring unit, for a period of ten years.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Patents, Copyrights and Trademarks.

bill.summary: 4/28/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Commerce to extend, upon its expiration, a certain numbered patent for a period of ten years.
